Technical elements: Welding equipment, metal surfaces, technical drawings, measurement tools, annotations. Mood: Elite craftsmanship, precision, technical excellence, modern industrial, professional workshop environment. Technical annotations: Include labels in Spanish and English, measurement scales, severity indicators (Crítico), technical specifications, detection methods (RT, UT, MT).
